name: Green Sugar Snap Peas With Tarragon
keywords: gluten-free, vegetarian, peas, side dish, spring
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
2 teaspoons chopped fresh tarragon or parsley

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan, bring to a boil enough water to cover the peas. Add the peas and salt to taste. Cook for 4 to 5 minutes or until they are crisp-tender. Drain immediately.
Return the peas to the saucepan and add the butter, tarragon, cumin, salt and pepper. Stir until the peas are well coated. Serve immediately.
